bug.author: benqua
bug.summary: SimpleCNN in zoo model has no output layer
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>Issue Description</denchmark-h>
In the zoo model, there is a <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/master/deeplearning4j-zoo/src/main/java/org/deeplearning4j/zoo/model/SimpleCNN.java>SimpleCNN</denchmark-link> network. This network has not output layer and is not trainable as is. Shouldn't the last layer be an output layer at <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/862b8aa13a3bee57d9699aea77f1bac8cad16969/deeplearning4j-zoo/src/main/java/org/deeplearning4j/zoo/model/SimpleCNN.java#L127>L127</denchmark-link> ?

comments.comment: The new API now allows you to specify that an output layer is not necessary. Closing.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
